summary: Allows you to break down Soulgems into shards at the smelter and to create soulgems with those shards at any forge.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][color=#ff0000]

[/color][center][color=#ff0000]This mod is OBSOLETE as being part of my new mod "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84871/?]The Art of Smithing[/url]".[/color][b] [/b][/center][b]


Description:[/b][/size]
I was a little unhappy with the aquisition of soulgems in the game and mods that allow you to craft them often add something I don't really like.

So here it is: a mod that allows you to use [u]Soulgem shards[/u] to create your soulgems at any forge. The shards are created by destroying [u]empty soulgems[/u] at the [u]smelter[/u].

Now you will want to pick up empty soulgems you'll find on your travels !


[b][size=3]How it works:[/size][/b]
Each soulgem type will give out a specified amount of shards. The same amount is needed to craft the gem back.

PettySoulgems: 2 shards
Lesser Sougems: 3 shards
Common Soulgems 4 shards
Greater Soulgems: 6 shards
Grand Soulgems: 9 shards
Black Soulgems: 12 shards

Obviously, all gems created are empty.

[size=3][b]Note:[/b][/size]
Soulgem Shards and Soulgem fragments are different. Fragments will not work for this mod.
author: VyseArcadia
